metadata.title: CVE-2019-10086 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache Commons Beanutils 1.9.2, a special BeanIntrospector class wasadded which allows suppressing the ability for an attacker to access theclassloader via the class property available on all Java objects. We,however were not using this by default characteristic of thePropertyUtilsBean.

criterions.comment: commons-beanutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
